definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: That might be good news for the nuclear industry.
sentences.chinese: 這可能對核工業來說是個好消息。

sentences.english: The nuclear industry tactic transferred and the nuclear power grew up rapidly since the reform and opening of China.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放以來，核工業戰略轉移，核電產業迅速崛起。

sentences.english: Manouchehr Takin, do you agree that the nuclear renaissance is at an end?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲核工業復興會窮途末路嗎？

sentences.english: Managed properly, a nuclear revival could be a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 處理得好，核工業的復興會成爲一件好事。

sentences.english: Now nuclear lobbyists are scrambling to defend the industry.
sentences.chinese: 如今，核能源遊說人士盡其所能維護其核工業。

sentences.english: Yes, I still loathe the liars who run the nuclear industry.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我仍然討厭那些核工業的騙子。

sentences.english: Many in the nuclear industry point the finger at Canada's nuclear regulator.
sentences.chinese: 核工業的許多企業把矛頭對準加拿大核能監管部門。
整個核工業界爲這次“核文藝復興”歡呼雀躍。

sentences.english: When it comes to safety, the nuclear industry emphasizes the concept of "defense in depth.
sentences.chinese: 談到安全問題，核工業界強調“縱深防禦”的概念。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
